REST API project
  • Help
  • User

User

/user Create a user

Create user - you must provide an app auth key.

Headers

Name Type Format Required Default Description
X-Auth string string(64) yes User's auth key

Params

Name Type Format Required Default Description
nickname string|array string(20)|string(20)[] yes For multiple nicknames: ['Nick1', 'Nick2']
fullname string string(100) yes User's full name
group string string(20) yes User's group. Possible values: admin|manager|user

Responses

Code Response Description
201 
[
    {
        "id": "ec014a44-554f-11e7-b114-b2f933d5fe66",
        "nickname": "Nick1",
        "fullname": "Nicky Doe",
        "group": "admin",
        "api_key": "dsa09ak320ede0-awld0a0sdla"
    },
    {
        "id": "d6a09dfa-554f-11e7-b114-b2f933d5fe66",
        "nickname": "Nick2",
        "fullname": "Nicky Doe",
        "group": "admin",
        "api_key": "dsa09ak320ede0-awld0a0sdla"
    }
]
400 
{
    "message": "Invalid group"
}
Only 'manager' group is currently supported
401 
{
    "error": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized!"
}
 401 Unauthorized
403 
{
    "error": 403,
    "message": "Forbidden!"
}
 403 Forbidden
500 
{
    "error": 500,
    "message": "Internal Server Error! Please try again later."
}
 500 Internal Server Error
Example #1
  • cURL
  • PHP
  • Go 
curl -X POST \
http://api.example.com/user \
-H 'cache-control: no-cache' \
-H 'content-type: application/json' \
-H 'X-Auth: dsa09ak320ede0-awld0a0sdla' \
-d '{
    "nickname": [
        "Nick1",
        "Nick2"
    ],
    "fullname": "Nick Doe",
    "group": "admin"
}'
